participant_1.background:
My business is growing, so I spend my days meeting with clients, booking venues, and coordinating vendors.
I want to treat my mom to her favorite fast food on this weekend as a celebration of her recovery from cancer.
we are getting married in a park.
I am grateful that my job provides me with the flexibility to be there for my son when he needs me.
i like football.

participant_2.background:
I'm going to have a nice lazy weekend with Toto.
I'm going to miss the sun and the beach, but I'm ready to focus on my studies.
my mom teaches kindergarten and my dad is a tax assessor.
i play guitar in the local band.
i am an artist.

content.text: Hey! I'm in the process of starting my own wedding planning business.
Wow! That sounds exciting. Are you a wedding planner?
Not yet, but I'm getting there! I'm currently taking some classes and networking with local venues and vendors.
That's great! I'm sure you'll be a great wedding planner. You seem really organized.
Thanks! I like to think I am. Do you have any plans for this weekend?
I'm going to have a nice lazy weekend with my dog, Toto. I'm also going to miss the sun and the beach, but I'm ready to focus on my studies.
That sounds like a nice relaxing weekend. What are you studying?
I'm studying to be an artist. I'm also in a local band.
Oh, that's awesome! I love art. What kind of art do you do?
I mainly paint, but I also do some sculpting.
That's amazing! I'd love to see your work sometime.
Sure, I'd be happy to show you.
Great! I'll PM you my email address.
